newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo Electron down on earnings results.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo Electron down on earnings results.

text.p: Shares of Tokyo Electron Ltd, a specialised electronics trading company, lost ground on Friday morning, depressed by its earnings results announced on Thursday, traders said.
By 0052 GMT, the share price was down 40 yen at 4,770, after having been ask-only at the opening. Its turnover was 303,000 shares.
Tokyo Electron said late on Thursday that its group net profit for 1996/97 declined to 29.97 billion yen from 30.96 billion yen a year earlier.
The firm forecast group net profit for 1997/98 at 28.00 billion yen.
